p: Between MM_LP and ww_LP, targeted genes for DE lncRNAs were enriched, the terms were mainly related to regulation of single organism signaling, signal transduction, cellular response to stimulus and cellular communication. DE mRNAs were enriched, the meaningful terms were related to regulation of RNA methylation, metabolic process, organic substance metabolic process (Fig. 3c, Supplementary material 5C, 6C).
